attributes.action: Combat the 'Compensation Culture' and its impacts on 'health and safety' overreaction
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Create a principle in law of 'the common sense of the man on the Clapham Omnibus'. This principle should be the first test of a compensation case in law. For example - If you buy hot coffee then common sense should tell you it's going to be hot. If you burn your mouth without taking adequate precautions then it's your fault and any compensation claim is without merit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
